name: jump to
content: Sprite jumps instantly to a specified location.

examples.name: Example 1
examples.description: Every time the ghost is clicked, it will jump to a random location.

examples.name: Example 2
examples.description: Every time the brown bunny is clicked, it will jump to the location of the purple bunny.

palette_params.name: sprite
palette_params.description: The sprite or sprite group to jump

palette_params.name: location
palette_params.description: The location that the sprite(s) should jump to

short_description: Sprite jumps instantly to a specified location.
